sections.title: Harrower (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Harrower class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Harrower)
sections.description: A harrower gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Spells (Harrower)
sections.description: A harrower continues spell progression from a previous spellcasting class and adds harrowing as a 3rd-level spell to all spell lists.

sections.title: Blessing of the Harrow (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Once per day, the harrower performs a 10-minute harrowing for allies within 20 feet, granting insight bonuses based on the most common suit drawn for 24 hours.

sections.title: Harrow Casting (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: The harrower can draw three Harrow cards while casting spells to potentially modify the spell's effects based on alignment matches and tower abilities.

sections.title: Tower of [Intelligence](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/basics-ability-scores/ability-scores/#Intelligence_Int) (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Intelligence suit card drawn during Harrow casting grants a +1 bonus on caster level checks to penetrate spell resistance.

sections.title: Tower of Strength (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Strength suit card drawn during Harrow casting adds +1 damage per die to spells that deal hit point damage.

sections.title: Tower of [Charisma](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/basics-ability-scores/ability-scores/#Charisma_Cha) (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Charisma suit card drawn during Harrow casting increases the spell's save DC by +1.

sections.title: Spirit Deck (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: As a standard action, the harrower summons a force deck that deals damage to a target within 30 feet based on alignment matches of drawn cards.

sections.title: Divination (Sp) (Harrower)
sections.description: The harrower can cast divination once per day as a spell-like ability with caster level equal to character level.

sections.title: Tower of Constitution (Ex) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Constitution suit card drawn during Harrow casting heals the harrower 1d6 points of damage.

sections.title: Tower of Dexterity (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Dexterity suit card drawn during Harrow casting grants +1 bonus to Reflex saves and AC until the beginning of next turn.

sections.title: Tower of Wisdom (Su) (Harrower)
sections.description: Each Wisdom suit card drawn during Harrow casting increases the spell's effective caster level by +1.

sections.title: Reading the Signs (Ex) (Harrower)
sections.description: The harrower can draw an extra card when using class abilities or magic items and choose one to ignore, usable every 1d4 rounds.

sections.title: Basic Fortune-Telling Methods (Harrower)
sections.description: Guidelines for GMs on conducting fortune-telling sessions including cold readings, true randomness, and false randomness techniques.

sections.title: Fortune-Telling Props (Harrower)
sections.description: Advice on using physical props like cards, dice, stones, and crystal balls to enhance fortune-telling sessions in gameplay.

sections.title: Fortune-Telling as Theater (Harrower)
sections.description: Techniques for creating dramatic fortune-telling sessions using metaphor, allegory, and prepared scripts to engage players.

sections.title: Mundane and Magical Fortune-Telling (Harrower)
sections.description: Discussion of legitimate versus fraudulent fortune-tellers and magical divination options available in Pathfinder RPG.
